Investment in Quality

Each project is uniquely priced based on materials, complexity, and scope. Here's a general guide to our pricing structure.

Custom Pieces

Starting at $500

Perfect for individual furniture pieces and small projects

  • Premium materials
  • Custom design consultation
  • 1-year warranty
  • 2-3 weeks delivery

Complete Projects

Starting at $2000

Ideal for full room installations and complex projects

  • Luxury materials selection
  • Detailed project planning
  • 3-year warranty
  • 4-6 weeks delivery
  • Priority support
